p: In the multivariate analysis model, we observed the best model that fit the assumptions and obtained a better AIC score (lower AIC). The highest adjusted R-squared (R 2) using hospital stay (days) and costs as the dependent variable is shown in Table 5. These models explained approximately 33.4% (R 2 = 0.334) of hospitalisation time and 79.3% (R 2 = 0.793) of hospitalisation costs.
